meanings: surprising, amazing, astonishing, astounding, shocking, startling; (훌륭하다) wonderful, marvelous

vlive.korean: 너무 놀라워요 진짜로 지금 이 친구 표정이... It's amazing. This friend's face... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉카소를 찾아라” ① (힙합팀 : SEVENTEEN)
정말 놀라워! Wow, so amazing! 듣기 View video GOT7 : [ #GOT7NOW ] 응원단장 맠겸🐥
놀라워요 진짜. I was so surprised. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : [Full] 'IDOL RADIO' ep#46. 들장미소년 (w. 아스트로 문빈, SF9 휘영, 더보이즈영훈)
그래서 지금 너무 놀라워요. so this is all very shocking right now. 듣기 View video StarNews : 2018 AAA 임윤아 x 류이호 깜짝만남
vlive.english: so this is all very shocking right now.

vlive.korean: 같이 한다고 하니까 되게 놀라워하고 - 어떻게 할까요? When we told them, they were really shocked. - What should I do? 듣기 View video JBJ95 : [#지금하95] 켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타켄타
vlive.english: When we told them, they were really shocked. - What should I do?

examples.korean: I’m surprised you fell for that trick. 발음듣기 네가 그 속임수에 속아 넘어가다니 놀라워. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m surprised you fell for that trick. 발음

examples.korean: I’m surprised that you of all people should say that. 발음듣기 다른 사람도 아닌 네가 그런 말을 하다니 놀라워. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m surprised that you of all people should say that. 발음

examples.korean: It’s amazing how ungrateful some people are, even after you go out of your way to help them. 발음듣기 자기를 도와주느라 남은 정말 고생했는데, 그런 걸 고마워할 줄 모르는 사람들을 보면 놀라워. DARAKWON
examples.english: It’s amazing how ungrateful some people are, even after you go out of your way to help them. 발음

examples.korean: They were surprised and told me my next meal is on the house. 발음듣기 놀라워하더니 다음 식사는 공짜라고 하더라고. DARAKWON
examples.english: They were surprised and told me my next meal is on the house. 발음

examples.korean: The astronomers wondered about how the universe stretched to infinity. 발음듣기 그 천문학자들은 우주의 무한함에 놀라워 했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The astronomers wondered about how the universe stretched to infinity. 발음
